description: List trailer assignments with filtering and pagination

flags.description: Filter by project transport plan ID
flags.name: --project-transport-plan

flags.description: Filter by minimum cached window start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
flags.name: --window-start-at-cached-min

flags.description: Filter by maximum cached window start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
flags.name: --window-start-at-cached-max

flags.description: Filter by minimum cached window end date (YYYY-MM-DD)
flags.name: --window-end-at-cached-min

flags.description: Filter by maximum cached window end date (YYYY-MM-DD)
flags.name: --window-end-at-cached-max

flags.description: Filter to most recent assignment per trailer (true/false)
flags.name: --most-recent
flags.validation: true/false (string); only 'true' applies the most-recent filter

permissions: Authorized via ProjectTransportPlanTrailerPolicy, which delegates access to the related project transport plan.
validation_notes: Status filter accepts 'editing' or 'active'. Window cached date filters expect YYYY-MM-DD. The most-recent filter only applies when set to the string 'true' to return the most recent assignment per trailer.
